metadata.title: CVE-2020-6098 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable denial of service vulnerability exists in the freeDiameterfunctionality of freeDiameter 1.3.2. A specially crafted Diameter requestcan trigger a memory corruption resulting in denial-of-service. An attackercan send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: freediameter package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
